questions_and_answers.question: What should be your immediate action in cases of severe bleeding?
options: A. Immediately wash the wound with soapy water
B. Apply a pressure on the wound and make the patient lie down
C. Try to remove any objects stuck in the wound
D. Give the patient a painkiller to ease the pain
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: B. Apply a pressure on the wound and make the patient lie down

questions_and_answers.question: What is the essential first step in treating a person who has received an electric shock?
options: A. Splash cold water on the victim
B. Apply a sterile dressing on the burns
C. Send for medical aid and then carry on with emergency treatment
D. Immediately start practicing artificial respiration
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: C. Send for medical aid and then carry on with emergency treatment

questions_and_answers.question: What is the recommended first aid technique for controlling severe bleeding?
options: A. Apply a hot compress to the wound
B. Pour water over the wound
C. Apply pressure on the wound and raise the injured part above the level of the body if possible
D. Rub the wound with antiseptic
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: C. Apply pressure on the wound and raise the injured part above the level of the body if possible
